title: How to Make Pickled Turnips

steps.headline: Cut the turnips into neat shapes.
Add vinegar, sugar and salt in a stainless steel pan.
Remove the pan from the stove and cool.
Clean the jar you'll put the pickled turnips in.
Fill the jar with the mix.
When jars are almost full, pour a layer of olive oil to fill them.

text: Cut the turnips into neat shapes.  Add vinegar, sugar and salt in a stainless steel pan.  Bring to a boil.  Add turnips.  Simmer for 10 minutes.  Remove the pan from the stove and cool.  Clean the jar you'll put the pickled turnips in.  Fill the jar with the mix.  When jars are almost full, pour a layer of olive oil to fill them.  Seal the jar[s].  Finished.
